description: From Middle English summehwile, summewile, sumwile, equivalent to some +‎ while. Compare Dutch somwijlen (“sometimes”).

entries.meaning: Sometimes; at one time or another; from time to time; at times
For a while; at one time; for a time
examples: Tho, under colour of shepeheards, somewhile / There crept in wolves, ful of fraude and guile.
